EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event CF CLOUD Summit Silicon Valley_Q217.Invite 5-31-17
EmailTemplate.subject: Less than 2 weeks to register and get 20% off your Cloud Foundry Summit ticket!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://goo.gl/IYof6n]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Less than 2 weeks to register and get 20% off your Cloud Foundry Summit ticket! Join us, and thousands of developers at Cloud Foundry Summit <[[https://goo.gl/IYof6n]]>, from June 13 - 15, 2017, in Silicon Valley to learn how to streamline your development pipeline in your language and framework of choice.
Register today and use the Pivotal discount code CFSV17PIV20 to get 20% off your Cloud Foundry Summit pass.
Register Here <[[https://goo.gl/IYof6n]]>
We hope to see you there!
The Pivotal Team
